author: Aaron Calvin, Maxwell Strachan
title: ‘I’m Terrified’: Wells Fargo Demands Call Center Employees Come Into Work
description: The bank has categorized those employees and others as "essential" workers who can't work from home during the pandemic.
content: Even as local and state governments around the country request that businesses let their employees work from home to help contain the growing threat of the coronavirus, Wells Fargo has labeled its workers at call centers, complaint departments, and retail ban… [+11263 chars]
